subject: Sports Injuries
Boxing
lead_paragraph: Shane Mosley, 42, lost by a technical knockout in the sixth round to Anthony Mundine in their W.B.A. international super welterweight title fight in Sydney, Australia, on Wednesday.
snippet: Shane Mosley, 42, lost by a technical knockout in the sixth round to Anthony Mundine in their W.B.A. international super welterweight title fight in Sydney, Australia, on Wednesday.
